title: Worms Armageddon - WormNET Pack 2016 [MULTI]
description:
Worms Armageddon - WormNET Pack 2016 [MULTI]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DESCRIPTION:

Worms Armageddon - one of the most awesome games of all times.
WormNET Pack - an advanced WA build, dedicated for playing on WormNET.
Full offline-modes also included.
Contains wk-modules, WormNET-snoopers, advanced editors,
sound/music packs, and more...
With WormNET Pack - you'll get practically everything what players need.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTENT:

- WA v.3.7.2.1 | built-in WormKit | D3D7 / D3D9 renderer
- GreenPill v.1.0.0.6 - CD Emulator
- wkRubberWorm v.0.0.1.17beta - most popular WK-module for modified gameplay
- wkD3D9Wnd v.0.6.6.6 - advanced window-mode for D3D9-renderer
- wkSuperFrontend v.0.3.0.0 - HD menu (modify from 640*480 to higher resolutions)
- wkWormNAT2 v.2.3.0.0 - updated WormNAT-protocol (hosting with NAT-connection)
- many other WormKit-modules (you'll find them in root folder of WA)
- The Wheat Snooper v.2.9.3 - popular snooper-client for WormNET
- Great Snooper v.1.4.9 - another popular snooper-client for WormNET
- SchemeEddy v.2.07 - advanced scheme editor
- MapGEN v.0.6.4 - advanced map generator for different types of schemes
- TeamED v.1.03 - advanced editor for teams-file (installer by StepS)
- optionally included unique music and sound packs:
Worms Armageddon - Hybrid HQ Music Pack [Complete]
Worms Armageddon - Hybrid HQ Sound Pack
- also included some small map-packs, popular schemes of WormNET,
and additional flags and graves.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

- After unpacking game build, check the directory:
"Worms ArmageddonWormNET_Pack"
A lot of useful things you'll find there.

- User content, including additional, is in:
"Worms ArmageddonUser"

- Root folder of WA contains not only "WA.exe",
but also all wk-modules and theirs ini-files, which contains settings of modules.

- Before starting WA for a first time, apply:
"Worms ArmageddonWormNET_PackSTARTUP SETTINGS.reg"
Then you can start the game and adjust any settings you need.

- If you have a NAT-connection,
for hosting games on WormNET you must use WormNAT-protocol.

To use WormNAT-protocol hosting from WA,
you'll need to place into root folder of WA this file:
"Worms ArmageddonWormNET_PackThe Wheat Snooper v.2.9.3WkfileswkWormNAT2.dll"
Or you can use "The Wheat Snooper" with WormNAT setting,
which will add wk-module into root folder of WA.
Also you can use "Great Snooper" with WormNAT setting,
which don't use wk-module at all.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ATTENTION!

WormNET Pack originally were created for Russian community.
So most of valuable information about build and complete manual -
- exists only in Russian language.

After downloading this torrent, you can read "README_ENG.txt",
and find there a link to original Russian torrent,
which has full information and complete manual in Russian.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TECH SUPPORT & CONTACT:

usage of things from all these "packs", and about WA itself.
